item.description:
Overviewï¼š
This game is about assembling mainframe. There are 6 parts to assemble the mainframe. This is a game for 4 players.

Game components:
12 red cards (computer cases)
72 blue cards (9 CPU, 9 motherboards, 9 memories, 18 GPU, 27 hard drives)
18 green cards (function cards)
Function cards
20 Change 1 component: update a hardware which has been installed.
18 Replace 2 component cards: discard 2 cards and draw 2 components cards.
6 Boom: Choose one player to uninstall 2 components on the deck expect computer case.
4 Robbery: Rob one player of one component card in hand.
1Rule book

Rules:
1.Each player is allotted three computer case cards, and each player need to choose one from three cards.
2.Player need to collect all parts of mainframe(computer case, motherboard, CPU, memories, GPU, hard drives).
3.Different computer case need different numbers of GPU and hard drives.
4.Each player only can install two hardware in one turn.
5.Each player in each turn can make a choice, one choice is draw two blue cards and one green card, the other choice is draw one green cards and one blue card.
6.Every function card should be used in the next turn,and every player only can use two function cards in one turn.
7.On the desk, the green cards need to face up 7 cards, player can decide draw facing up card, or pile. If the facing up cards are drew, the facing up cards will be supplemented.
8. Every player can trade with other players.
9.Each player must face up the cards which they decide to install on the deck. If they do this action, they can’t change them unless using function cards.
10.If one player finishes all the parts, the game still need to finish next round.
Procedures:
1.Each player will get three computer case cards, and each player must choose one of three cards.
2.Players need to use Rock Paper Scissors to decide who is the first, then the game is on a clockwise.
3.Before players draw cards, they can use only one function card.
4.Each player in each turn can make a choice, one choice is draw two blue cards and one green card, the other choice is draw one green cards and one blue card.
5.If player want to install a part, he/she need to face up the card on the desk.

Win state: 
If only one player finishes installing mainframe in this round, he/she win.
If more than one players finishes installing mainframe in this round, they will compare who get higher points in the game. And the player who get higher points win.
